People in Focus | Roberto Liolli

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1498&user=10620> 	

When Roberto joined Chalhoub Group in Dubai, he never imagined the transformative path ahead. Over the past two years, he has grown from sharpening his skills in Strategy and Business Development to mentoring other team members and leading by example, with empathy and integrity.


Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1498&user=10620>  to read more on how Roberto found his purpose, built lasting connections, and made his mark through passion, impact, and collaboration at the Group.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

A Season of Style at Marassi - Egypt


Our Summer 2025 Campaign is live at Marassi, North Coast – Egypt, with our brands presence.
